pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulated Goodness-of-Fit Tests for Discrete Distributions // Implements fast, Monte Carlo simulations for goodness-of-fit (GOF) tests for discrete distributions. This includes tests based on the root-mean-square statistic, the Chi-squared statistic, the log-likelihood-ratio statistic (G^2), and the Kolmogorov-Smirnov statistic.
